titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 70th anniversary of the Berlin Airlift and honoring the veterans of Operation Vittles.
A resolution commemorating the 70th anniversary of the Berlin Airlift and honoring the veterans of Operation Vittles.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

calendar.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Reported by Senator Corker without amendment and with an amended preamble. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 611.

bill.summary:
Recognizes the 70th anniversary of the Berlin Airlift, the largest and longest humanitarian airlift operation in history.
Honors the men and women who participated in and supported the Berlin Airlift.
